entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a character in the story. She is mentioned as having a conversation with Snape.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of people that Professor McGonagall mentions. They have their own private means of communication.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a character in the story. He is mentioned as having a conversation with Professor McGonagall and pretending not to hear her.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall mentions that Death Eaters have their own private means of communication, as stated in the text: 'You Death Eaters have you own private means of communication, I forgot.'
Snape is mentioned to be having a conversation with Professor McGonagall, as stated in the text: 'said Professor McGonagall.  You Death Eaters have you own private means of communication, I forgot.'
Professor McGonagall is mentioned to be being watched by Snape, as stated in the text: 'His eyes were still probing the air all about her, and he was moving gradually closer,'
